New_Brunswick.Patricks Corner, New Jersey: Patricks Corner or Patricks Corners is an unincorporated community located along the border of East Brunswick and North Brunswick townships in Middlesex County, New Jersey, United States. Adjacent to Farrington Lake (through which the East Brunswick–North Brunswick municipal line runs), the East Brunswick side is about half residential homes and half forestland. The North Brunswick side is much denser with more homes in the area.
